techmeme.title: Disney says it has an estimated 157M global MAUs for ad-supported content across its streaming platforms, including 112M users in the US (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
Ivanti warns that a zero-day in its widely-used Connect Secure VPN service has been exploited to compromise the networks of its corporate customers (Carly Page/TechCrunch)
Sources: Eric Schmidt is working on an AI startup called Hooglee, which describes its mission as "democratizing video creation with AI" (Sarah Emerson/Forbes)
xAI is testing a standalone iOS app for its chatbot Grok in several countries like the US, Australia, and India; Grok was available only to X users until now (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Taiwan's National Security Bureau says daily average cyberattacks on government departments doubled in 2024 vs. 2023 to 2.4M, mostly from Chinese cyber forces (Yimou Lee/Reuters)
